data.name: XCavalypse VR
data.detailed_description:
XCavalypse VR is a free DLC for the Vive headset. Revamped, optimized and made standalone this time completely for free for everyone who owns XCavalypse.

Immerse yourself in a apocalyptic virtual reality where you take part in an effort to clean up a city from zombies using an excavator.

What you should expect in XCavalypse VR?

XCavalypse VR is a dexterity game, controlling an excavator is a challenge on its own, zombies, guns, and survival elements is a justification of what in real-life would be somewhat boring. In essence, this a very interesting excavator simulator

Be Aware of motion sickness as this is a cockpit/vehicle game

Early Access Features

  • Optimized for VR
  • Realistic Excavator Controls
  • Persistent World (Save-Load System)
  • Firearms
  • Zombie Dismembering
  • Destructible Environments
